title: VZLA Cambio
description: Mobile app for tracking VES/USD exchange rates according to BCV, with candlestick charts. It allows users to set alerts for specific exchange rates and provides a history of the last 30 days.

title: EPP Box Demo
description: This app, presented to EPP Box as demo, manages registered users' access to a CrossFit box, allowing each user to view available workouts (WODs) and sign up for or cancel a reservation for each WOD. The app uses Firebase email authentication to grant or deny access.

title: Tip & Split Traveler
description: Android app for calculating tips and splitting bills with real-time currency conversion. It allows users to set a default currency and provides a simple interface for entering amounts and calculating tips.
